name: Breakfast No. 1
description: 2 sausage, 2 bacon, 1 egg, served with your choice of beans, grilled tomatoes or tinned tomatoes. Comes with toast and a cup of tea or coffee.

name: Breakfast No. 2
description: 2 sausages, 2 bacon and a fried egg served alongside buttered barm mushrooms and your choice of grilled or tinned tomatoes. Finished with toast and a cup of tea or coffee.

name: Breakfast No. 3
description: Lancashire black pudding, crispy bacon, fried egg, mushrooms, one sliced toast & beans. Includes a cup of tea or coffee.

name: Breakfast No. 4
description: Bacon, sausage, egg, hash browns, black pudding, and toast. Includes a cup of tea or coffee.

name: Breakfast No. 5
description: Double sausage, double egg, double hash browns & Toast. Served with beans or tomatoes. Includes a cup of tea or coffee.

name: Vegetarian Breakfast No. 1
description: 2 vegetarian sausages, egg, beans, tomatoes, hash brown and toast. Includes a cup of tea or coffee.

name: Vegetarian Breakfast No. 2
description: Two crispy vegetarian sausages, two golden hash browns, a hearty serving of homemade bubble & squeak & mushrooms. Includes a cup of tea or coffee.

name: Build Your Perfect Breakfast Barm
description: Choose from bacon, sausage, egg, hash brown, mushrooms, black pudding, or vegetarian sausage. Available as 1, 2, 3, or 4 item barm.
